title: "GOUGE'EM VALOR" is so much less sadistic now
body:
Why people play quinn:

* See a squish solo pushing half-way across the map.
* "Meh I guess I'll go kill that now."
* Ult.
* 5-second interim, play some relaxing jazz music.
* e, q, r, done.
* Spam valor comments in all-chat.

HOW AM I SUPPOSE TO COMPLETE THE LAST STEP IF VALOR NO LONGER SWOOPS IN AND GOUGES PEOPLE'S EYES OUT.

Yes, I know I can just kill people the old fashioned way, "pew! pew! pew!" but... ugh... it just won't be the same. *sniffle*

P.S. To those who are confused by this thread, I'm referring to Quinn reworks on the PBE.

replies.body: Lets just say Valor got old. Now he cant hit his opponents eyes anymore, he just marks them :[

How can you mark people you can't even see?! Could you magic marker your sleeping college roommates if you don't even know where they are?! On that note, MY suggested tooltip:

_Valor periodically magic-marks enemy's faces with mustaches and other insulting depictions, leaving them feeling emotionally compromised and vulnerable, open to bonus damage from Quinn's next basic attack._

_Quinn: "Valor... that's just mean!"_

EDIT: Somehow I thought you said something about Valor's eyesight getting old... guess not ... ... MY POINT STANDS.
